text: The Montezuma Hotel is a historic building in Nogales, Arizona. It was built in 1926, and designed in the Spanish Colonial Revival architectural style. With It was built as the largest hotel in Nogales. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since August 26, 1985. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Santa Cruz County, Arizona Category:American colonial architecture Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1926 Category:1926 establishments in Arizona
title: Montezuma Hotel
